node.text: Antique washed leather crossbody flap bag with hand tooling on front and back, silver or brass-tone studs, and tooled cross on flap. SKU: 8572845 Main interior can store your keys, wallet, sunglasses, phone, and a few small cosmetics. An adjustable crossbody strap for easy carrying. Front slip pocket. Flap with magnetic snap closure. American West signature printed lining with a back wall zip pocket and three accessory pouches. Handcrafted in Paraguay. Measurements: Bottom Width: 6 1⁄2 in Depth: 3 1⁄4 in Height: 8 1⁄2 in Strap Length: 57 1⁄2 in Strap Drop: 27 in Weight: 11.5 oz This product may have a manufacturer's warranty. Please visit the manufacturer's website or contact us at warranty@support.zappos.com for full manufacturer warranty details.
